title: ABOUT US
content: In an effort to increase representation and diversify the engineering industry, SPIES aims to meet the demand for culturally diverse scholars of the engineering discipline.

title: STUDENTS
content: Over the years, SPIES has seen many of our members graduating in their notable dark violet engineering robes. We hope that we can continue to support students currently studying in schools, university and beyond.

title: SI'I OUTREACH
content: By going out into schools in the community, we seek to Inform and Inspire our youth. We aim to help them realise their potential in engineering and inform them of the vast opportunities; but more importantly, why they as young MƒÅori and Pasifika are essential to the engineering industry.

title: OUR PARTNERS
content: Our sponsors are the reason we are able to keep growing. Without their help, we would not be in a position to make a change, as we are today.

title: OUR ALUMNI
content: Many SPIES members have completed their journey at the university, and go on to excel in industry. They continue strive for success both in NZ, and internationally.

title: OUR TEAM
content: Each year, a new set of volunteers are nominated to serve SPIES to the best of their ability. As the back bone of the SPIES name, every team member is able to give SPIES their own spin, and are able learn and grow from previous years. They all share a common goal.
